targets.query: SELECT "mean_load_instant_power" FROM "http" WHERE $timeFilter tz('$tz')
SELECT max(from_pw) - max(to_pw) FROM autogen.http WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT max(from_grid) - max(to_grid) FROM autogen.http WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT "mean_percentage" FROM "http" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT min("grid_status") +1  FROM "grid"."http" WHERE grid_status = 0 and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT "mean_percentage" FROM "http" WHERE $timeFilter

options.content: Firmware

targets.query: SELECT  (1+from_solar/abs(from_solar))*from_solar/2  FROM (SELECT integral(solar)/1000/3600 - integral(to_pw)/1000/3600 - integral(to_grid)/1000/3600  AS from_solar FROM autogen.http WHERE  $timeFilter tz('$tz'))
SELECT min("grid_status") FROM "grid"."http" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous) tz('$tz')
SELECT min("grid_status") + 1 FROM "grid"."http" WHERE grid_status = 0 and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null) tz('$tz')

SELECT (home - from_grid) / home FROM 
  (SELECT integral("home")  AS home, integral("from_grid")  AS from_grid 
      FROM "autogen"."http" WHERE $timeFilter)
SELECT (integral("from_grid") - integral("to_grid"))   / 1000 / 3600 FROM "autogen"."http" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT fp FROM (SELECT sum("from_pw")  * $avg_buy_per_kwh AS fp FROM kwh.http WHERE  $timeFilter tz('$tz'))
SELECT s - (tp + tg) FROM (SELECT sum("solar") * $avg_buy_per_kwh AS s,  sum("to_pw")  * $avg_buy_per_kwh AS tp, sum("to_grid") * $avg_buy_per_kwh AS tg FROM kwh.http WHERE  $timeFilter tz('$tz'))
SELECT tgg FROM (SELECT sum("to_grid") * $avg_sell_per_kwh AS tgg FROM kwh.http WHERE  $timeFilter tz('$tz'))

SELECT tgg + (s - tp - tg ) + fp FROM (SELECT sum("to_pw")  * $avg_buy_per_kwh AS tp, sum("solar") * $avg_buy_per_kwh AS s, sum("to_grid") * $avg_buy_per_kwh AS tg, sum("from_pw") * $avg_buy_per_kwh AS fp, sum("to_grid") * $avg_sell_per_kwh AS tgg FROM kwh.http WHERE  $timeFilter tz('$tz'))

SELECT  (1+from_solar/abs(from_solar))*from_solar/2  FROM (SELECT integral(solar)/1000/3600 - (integral(to_pw) - integral(grid_to_pw))/1000/3600  - integral(to_grid)/1000/3600  AS from_solar FROM (SELECT from_solar, solar, to_pw, to_grid, ((from_grid - home - solar) + ABS((from_grid - home - solar))) / 2 AS grid_to_pw FROM autogen.http WHERE  $timeFilter tz('$tz')))
SELECT integral("from_pw")  / 1000 / 3600 FROM "autogen"."http" WHERE $timeFilter tz('$tz')

SELECT (integral(from_grid) - integral(grid_to_pw))/1000/3600  AS from_grid FROM (SELECT from_grid, ((from_grid - home - solar) + ABS((from_grid - home - solar))) / 2 AS grid_to_pw FROM autogen.http WHERE  $timeFilter tz('$tz'))

patterns.name: Grid
patterns.transform_values:
Exporting
_value_
| Idle | Importing
_value_

patterns.name: Battery
patterns.transform_values:
Charging
_value_
| Idle | Discharging
_value_

targets.query: SELECT last("load_instant_power")  / 1000 AS "Home", last("solar_instant_power")  / 1000 AS "Solar", last("battery_instant_power")  / 1000 AS "Battery", last("site_instant_power")  / 1000 AS "Grid" FROM "raw"."http" WHERE time >= now() - 10m
SELECT sum("home") FROM "kwh"."http" WHERE ("home" > 0) GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null) tz('$tz')
SELECT sum("solar") FROM "kwh"."http" WHERE ("solar" > 0) GROUP BY time(1d) fill(0) tz('$tz')
SELECT sum("from_grid") - sum("to_grid") as "grid" FROM "kwh"."http" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(0) tz('$tz')
SELECT mean("ISLAND_VL1N_Load") FROM "vitals"."http" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("ISLAND_VL3N_Load") FROM "vitals"."http" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("PW1_PINV_VSplit1") FROM "vitals"."http" WHERE "ISLAND_VL1N_Load" < 200.0 AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
